org.qbroker.net

Class SFTPConnector

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.qbroker.net.SFTPConnector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Connector
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SFTPMessenger

    public class SFTPConnector
extends java.lang.Object
implements Connector
    SFTPConnector connects to a SSH server and provides the following methods for file transfers: sftpGet(), sftpPut() and sftpList().

    This is NOT MT-Safe. Therefore, you need to use multiple instances to achieve your MT-Safty goal.
    Author:
    yannanlu@yahoo.com

      • sftpList

        public java.lang.String[] sftpList(java.lang.String dirname,
                          int type)
                            throws com.jcraft.jsch.SftpException
        It returns an array of strings for requested files of type. In case of failure, it returns null. Due to individual parsing errors, the array may contain null members if type is FTP_ALL. In this case, caller should check each entry for null. For other types, any null member will be skipped. The names in the array do not contain the full path.
        Throws:
        com.jcraft.jsch.SftpException

      • createDirectory

        public java.lang.String createDirectory(java.lang.String dirname,
                               int retry)
                                 throws com.jcraft.jsch.SftpException
        It checks the existence of the directory tree on the server and creates the missing ones if necessary. It returns null if successful or the failed directory name otherwise. It requires the absolute path for dirname.
        Throws:
        com.jcraft.jsch.SftpException

      • getParent

        protected static java.lang.String getParent(java.lang.String filename)
        It returns dirname of the filename or null if it is a relative path.
